completeTask(uint256).details: Reverts if task is not yet eligible (deadline not reached) or already completed.

createTodo(string,string,uint256).details: Task IDs increment automatically. Reverts if maximum tasks reached or inputs invalid.

params._deadline: UNIX timestamp after which the task can be completed (0 for no deadline)
params._description: Description of the task, minimum 10 characters
params._name: Name of the task, minimum 5 characters

params._deadline: Updated task deadline, set to 0 to leave unchanged
params._description: Updated task description (min 10 chars), set to "" to leave unchanged
params._id: ID of the task to update
params._name: Updated task name (min 5 chars), set to "" to leave unchanged

clearAllTasks().notice: Delete all tasks for the caller

createTodo(string,string,uint256).notice: Create a new task for the caller

getActiveTasks().notice: Get all active tasks for the caller

getAllTasks().notice: Get all active tasks for the caller

getUserTask(uint256).notice: Get a single task by ID
